news_header: Volkswagen is planning significant cuts, including a 10% salary reduction and potential factory closures in Germany, affecting thousands of employees.
news_text: The Labour Council reports that Autokit Volkswagen is contemplating a 10% salary cut for employees and the closure of several factories in Germany, which could lead to the termination of tens of thousands of jobs. Daniela Cavallo, Director of the Volkswagen Workplace Council, emphasized the seriousness of the situation, stating it is not merely a negotiation tactic. The German Labour Act supports the establishment of workplace councils, which have rights to information and participation in decisions regarding personnel and pay.
